events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the software engineer position and it looks promising based on the initial resume review.
The application has been categorized under Engineering as the candidate has relevant experience in software development and devops practices.
A recruiter has been assigned to this case to coordinate the next steps and ensure a smooth process for the candidate.
The candidate completed the initial screening interview, demonstrating solid knowledge in software engineering principles and devops tools.
The candidate responded promptly and positively to the screening feedback, expressing eagerness to move forward in the process.
A technical interview has been scheduled for the candidate to evaluate their coding skills, problem solving, and understanding of software design.
The candidate successfully completed the technical interview, demonstrating excellent problem-solving skills and a strong grasp of relevant technologies.
The HR interview was scheduled to discuss the candidate's work culture fit, benefits, and other administrative details.
The candidate completed the HR interview with a positive attitude, aligning well with our company values and expectations.
Following the successful interviews, a job offer was proposed to the candidate with competitive salary and benefits package.
The candidate provided positive feedback about the offer and the interview process, expressing excitement about joining the team.
The candidate formally accepted the offer, confirming their intention to start and join the engineering department.
New hire onboarding has commenced, including system access setup, introductions to teams, and initial training sessions scheduled.
The hiring process is officially closed. The candidate has successfully onboarded and is now a full member of the engineering team.
